data.description: Interface to Studio Cental's AMP protocol
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module AMP is an abstract interface to SGI Studio Central Asset
    Management System's AMP protocol. It enables logging in to the
    Studio Central system and adding/removing assets; meanwhile creating
    datamodels. It enables developers to interact with Studio Central
    easily from PERL, and adding extra functionality to the system.
